No_ I'm not kidding you. My grandmother is the same way. People get stressed_ and they take that negative energy out on others either without thinking about it or merely to get the negative energy tension released.
Well first option on the table is stress obviously
Then why don't you initiate the conversation?

I think I do get it. My mother was like that a lot. She lived in the same house yet she would only ever look at me and never initiate conversation_ she'd stay sedentary in her room for days on end and I would see her maybe once a week. It was 10 days between when I saw her on Christmas and the last day I'd ever get to see my mother before she died. My only regret is not communicating enough.
We're all lost.
Yeah_ life gives us all a beating
Everything happens for a reason. I guess you had to become stronger from those situations for some reason.
And through that you train your discipline like a muscle and it grows
In my entire 15 years I don't remember a single day of it being easy
You are what you make of your situation

Well_ instead of getting my act together and getting a headstart on living without the shoulders of a parent to cry or lie on at age 15_ I could've turned to drugs [I was also abusing drugs in August 2018] or I could've just stopped caring in general and let myself fall into a depression.
